## Publication type

Represents the data of a Publication: a "Repository" used for publishing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Publication = Repository & {
    ComponentSnapshotTemplate?: Link;
    ComponentTemplateProcess?: Link;
    DefaultComponentTemplate?: Link;
    DefaultPageTemplate?: Link;
    DefaultTemplateBuildingBlock?: Link;
    Locale?: string;
    MultimediaPath?: string;
    MultimediaUrl?: string;
    PageSnapshotTemplate?: Link;
    PageTemplateProcess?: Link;
    PublicationPath?: string;
    PublicationType?: string;
    PublicationUrl?: string;
    RootStructureGroup?: Link;
    ShareProcessAssociations?: boolean;
    TemplateBundleProcess?: Link;
};
```
